  Because the tax is only on wealth above our threshold we avoid crowding out lower‑income households; capital flight is unlikely at a 5 % rate and earmarking ensures the revenue is deployed where it matters most—health and energy.  

- Outcome:  
  The health program will reduce waiting times, lower costs for families, and keep people healthier while the upgraded grid will improve reliability and cut our energy bills by 10–15 %.  In other words, we are investing in the very infrastructure that keeps the economy running.

I have scrutinized the numbers, weighed the risks, and confirmed that this act is a net benefit to our community.  
Therefore I urge you all to vote YES on the “Civic Renewal” Act. Thank you for your time and consideration.
